ygData.subject: Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe this should turn into a general discussion list. :-). Anyway. I have recently ditched my Dark Elf characters and went to a Barbarian Warrior. Only after
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe this should turn into a general discussion list. :-). Anyway. I have
recently ditched my Dark Elf characters and went to a Barbarian Warrior. Only
after seeing them slaughter my guards in Nektulos. Was very impressive. What
weapon is a good newbie 1 handed slashing weapon? Back in beta I used a rusty
falchion that I got off a decaying skeleton. There something better until I
raise enough money to get a mino axe. Or combine sword? Also, any way to
level really really fast? With a Barbarian Warrior. That is where the cheat
comes into it I guess. Thanks.
